text: useene aapapar[1] ye pustak (quraan) utaaree hai, jisamen kuchh aayaten muhî€¼kam[2] (sudrdh) hain, jo pustak ka mool aadhaar hain tatha kuchh doosaree mutashaabih[3] (sandigdh) hain. to jinake dilon mein kutilata hai, ve upadrav kee khoj tatha manamaana arth karane ke lie, sandigdh ke peechhe pad jaate hain. jabaki unaka vaastavik arth, allaah ke siva koee nahin jaanata tatha jo gyaan mein pakke hain, ve kahate hain ki sab, hamaare paalanahaar ke paas se hai aur budhdimaan log hee shiksha grahan karate hain
